metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4273 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the exFAT driver of the Linux kernel. The vulnerabilityexists in the implementation of the file name reconstruction function,which is responsible for reading file name entries from a directory indexand merging file name parts belonging to one file into a single long filename. Since the file name characters are copied into a stack variable, alocal privileged attacker could use this flaw to overflow the kernel stack.
